channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Mendix Forgot Password Appstore module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Mendix Forgot Password Appstore module

item.title: CVE-2022-26313|2024-08-03T05:03:31.844Z -- siemens -- mendix%20forgot%20password%20appstore%20module
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Mendix Forgot Password Appstore module (All versions >= V3.3.0 < V3.5.1). In certain configurations of the affected product, a threat actor could use the sign up flow to hijack arbitrary user accounts.

item.title: CVE-2022-26314|2024-08-03T05:03:32.350Z -- siemens -- mendix%20forgot%20password%20appstore%20module
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Mendix Forgot Password Appstore module (All versions >= V3.3.0 < V3.5.1), Mendix Forgot Password Appstore module (Mendix 7 compatible) (All versions < V3.2.2). Initial passwords are generated in an insecure manner. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to efficiently brute force passwords in specific situations.
